content: MultilinearMap are maps from ∀ (i : ι), M₁ i to M₂ which are linear in each coordinate. Has there been any attempt at generalizing this notion to be Semilinear in each coordinate? Sorry if this is asked before.
This sounds like it will be rather painful, but that's not to say it is necessarily a bad idea
Why would you want this, out of interest?

Kevin Buzzard said:

Why would you want this, out of interest?

This may, or may not, facilitates constructing a Hilbert space from tensor product of a family of Hilbert spaces, as inner product is anti-linear in its first argument. But I have to think more.
